title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
Add egg mixture and toss quickly
Season with black pepper and serve

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 2 hours
Add coconut cream and bring to simmer
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice, olive oil, egg, Worcestershire sauce, anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
instructions: Make dressing with anchovy, garlic, egg yolk, and lemon

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Soft or hard shell tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan
Top with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and salsa
